description.short: You can use Orky to execute scripts!
description.full: You can use Orky to register your own local bot in Microsoft Teams and store + execute scripts from ANYWHERE!

commands.title: add
commands.description: Adds a bot with the given name. The name can only contain alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, and 0-9).

commands.title: remove
commands.description: Removes a bot with the given name.

commands.title: copy
commands.description: Copies a bot and returns the copy key.

commands.title: paste
commands.description: Pastes a bot referenced by the copy key into this team.

commands.title: status
commands.description: Shows the status of your bots.

commands.title: tell
commands.description: Tells a bot to execute a command.
